import React from 'react' import { slider } from '../../data/Events' import icon from '../../assets/images/event/icon.svg' const EventsCart = () => { const events = slider || []; return (
{events.length > 0 ? ( events.map((item, index) => ( <> {item.text}

{item.name}

{item.price}

{item.date}

{item.location}

)) ) : (

No events available.

)}
) } export default EventsCart
